name: 02-Data-Preparation
content:
Data-Definition and Data-Preparation


Data Description:-

These Datasets are designed to provide information that will help predict whether a given supplier is worthy to be classified as a 'Good' or not.These are the following data sets:-


Suppliers:

  • SupplierID :- Provides a ID to identify each Supplier
  • SupplierName :- Contains the name of the Supplier
  • Region:- Tells Location of the Supplier
  • YearsInBusiness:- Tells the number of years the supplier has been in Business
  • LeadTime:-It is the time taken to receive supply from Supplier
  • PriceIndex:-It is a measure of how prices change over a period of time,
  • OrderFulfillmentTime:-Time taken to Fulfil the order
  • OverallCost:- Total cost for the transaction with supplier
  • OrderCancellations:-No of cancellations with Supplier
  • CustomerRating:- Rating of supplier as per Customers


Orders:

  • OrderID:-Unique ID of order to identify it among others
  • SupplierID:-Provides a ID to identify each Supplier
  • OrderQuantity:-Quantity of Orders placed
  • OrderLeadTime:-It is the time it takes for the business to receive an order and fulfill it
  • OrderCost:- Cost of the Order


Parts:

  • PartID:-Unique ID for a given part
  • SupplierID:-Provides a ID to identify each Supplier
  • PartName:-Name of the Part
  • PartCategory:-Category in which the part is classified under
  • PartQualityScore:-Score based on the quality of the part



Data Preparation

Steps include:

  • Cleaning: Check for duplicates, invalid supplier IDs, or missing values.
  • Transformation: Normalize cost- and time-based variables for fair comparison.
  • Feature Engineering:
  • AverageOrderQuantity per supplier.
  • CancellationRate = OrderCancellations / TotalOrders.
  • SupplierScore = Weighted combination of cost, quality, fulfillment, and rating.
  • Integration: Join datasets on SupplierID to create a unified supplier performance dataset.
